item.title: Jason Mraz - I Won't Give Up - Key of D
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz
Using the chords: A Bm7 C C# D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU or D DU U (or a combination of both)
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered (1 tone) to make it more suitable for the ukulele
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Jason Mraz - Have It All - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. Transposed up a minor second from the original.
As performed by Jason Mraz.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Jason Mraz - Have It All - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G. Transposed up a minor third from the original.
As performed by Jason Mraz.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: Jason Mraz - More Than Friends - Key of D
item.description:
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos
This tutorial will show you how to play More Than Friends on the ukulele by Demi Lovato. The chords used are D G A Bm F#m.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Jason Mraz - More Than Friends - Key of C
item.description:
▶ Check out my gear on Kit: https://kit.com/AndyRamos
This tutorial will show you how to play More Than Friends on the ukulele by Jason Mraz & Meghan Trainor. The chords used are C F G Am Em.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Jason Mraz - Lucky - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C (Original Key).
As performed by Jason Mraz and Colbie Caillat.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Jason Mraz - I'm Yours - Key of C
item.description: C, G, Am, F (and two instances of D7)! Clean language version for teachers at https://youtu.be/BFxVN_wVBgs
